description:
I never thought I’d see the day when praising my God would mean standing in defiance against my government. I never thought I’d see the day I would need to stand in defiance against my government. Newsom has overstepped his authority by ignoring our Constitutional rights to practice our faith and to peaceably gather.

•

For individuals who feel it is better for them to isolate, social distance, or wear face masks, please do so. I respect everyone’s decision, will respect anyone’s physical boundaries, and will not shame anyone for their decision. But I will not bend my knee to fear, listen to the lies of the media that are causing mass panic and fear, or allow my praise to be silenced.

•

I encourage every church in California to stand with us.

•

#unconstitutional #wecanmovemountains #walkawaymovement #1stamendment #civilunrest #recallnewsom #faucifraud #informationwarfare #americafirst🇺🇸 #saveamerica #governornewsom #antimask #gavinnewsomsucks #drfauci #faucifraud #plandemic2020 #wedonotconsent #letschangethenarrative #agentsofchange #exitthematrix #masksdontwork #coronahoax2020 #deepstateexposed #plandemic2020 #saveamerica #wherewegoonewegoall #antimask #fauci #faucifraud #nomasks #wedonotconsent
